languages.text: "Второй — менее рациональный, но также приемлемый — проявить своеволие. Я найду тебе применение в любом случае. Например, переработаю в разумный суп, который сохранит чувствительность прежней формы и будет осознавать происходящее с ним до полного расщепления и окончания пищеварительного процесса. По глазам вижу, что выбор ты уже сделал{mf||а}".

"The second option, which is less rational but just as acceptable, is to be obstinate. I will find a use for you in any case. For instance, you could be processed into a sentient soup that retains the sensations and awareness of its original form and is therefore aware of everything that happens until it dissolves completely at the end of the digestive process. I see from your expression that you have already chosen."
languages.original_text: "Второй — менее рациональный, но также приемлемый — проявить своеволие. Я найду тебе применение в любом случае. Например, переработаю в разумный суп, который сохранит чувствительность прежней формы и будет осознавать происходящее с ним до полного расщепления и окончания пищеварительного процесса. По глазам вижу, что выбор ты уже сделал{mf||а}".

traits.locale_text: "The second option, less rational but just as acceptable, is obstinacy. In either case, I will find a use for you. Such as processing you into sentient soup that will retain the senses of its original form and will therefore be aware of everything that occurs to it all the way until its complete breakdown at the end of the digestion process. Judging by the look in your eyes, the choice has already been made."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: "The second option, less rational but just as acceptable, is obstinacy. In either case, I will find a use for you. Such as processing you into sentient soup that will retain the senses of its original form and will therefore be aware of everything that occurs to it all the way until its complete breakdown at the end of the digestion process. Judging by the look in your eyes, the choice has already been made."

traits.locale_text: "The second option, which is less rational but just as acceptable, is to be obstinate. I will find a use for you in any case. For instance, you could be processed into a sentient soup that retains the sensations and awareness of its original form and is therefore aware of everything that happens until it dissolves completely at the end of the digestive process. I see from your expression that you have already chosen."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: « La seconde solution, moins rationnelle mais néanmoins acceptable, est de faire preuve d'obstination. Mais dans ce cas, je vous trouverai une autre utilité. Par exemple, je pourrais vous transformer en une soupe organique tout en préservant votre conscience. Vous conserveriez ainsi la perception de vos sensations jusqu'à ce que la dissolution soit terminée à l'issue du processus digestif. Je vois à votre expression que vous avez déjà fait votre choix. »
languages.original_text: "The second option, which is less rational but just as acceptable, is to be obstinate. I will find a use for you in any case. For instance, you could be processed into a sentient soup that retains the sensations and awareness of its original form and is therefore aware of everything that happens until it dissolves completely at the end of the digestive process. I see from your expression that you have already chosen."

traits.locale_text: « La seconde solution, moins rationnelle mais néanmoins acceptable, est de faire preuve d'obstination. Mais dans ce cas, je vous trouverai une autre utilité. Par exemple, je pourrais vous transformer en une soupe organique tout en préservant votre conscience. Vous conserveriez ainsi la perception de vos sensations jusqu'à ce que la dissolution soit terminée à l'issue du processus digestif. Je vois à votre expression que vous avez déjà fait votre choix. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: “第二个选择虽然没那么理性，但也同样可以接受，那就是坚持你的立场。但无论如何，我都会让你派上用场。比如说，我可以把你加工成拥有知觉的肉汤。这种肉汤保留着原始形态的感觉和意识，也能感知周围所发生的一切，直到被彻底消化殆尽为止。从你的表情来看，我看得出来，你已经做好了选择。”
languages.original_text: "The second option, which is less rational but just as acceptable, is to be obstinate. I will find a use for you in any case. For instance, you could be processed into a sentient soup that retains the sensations and awareness of its original form and is therefore aware of everything that happens until it dissolves completely at the end of the digestive process. I see from your expression that you have already chosen."

traits.locale_text: “第二个选择虽然没那么理性，但也同样可以接受，那就是坚持你的立场。但无论如何，我都会让你派上用场。比如说，我可以把你加工成拥有知觉的肉汤。这种肉汤保留着原始形态的感觉和意识，也能感知周围所发生的一切，直到被彻底消化殆尽为止。从你的表情来看，我看得出来，你已经做好了选择。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Die zweite Option — weniger rational, aber ebenso akzeptabel — ist, Euch stur zu stellen. Ich finde auf jeden Fall eine Verwendung für Euch. Ich könnte Euch beispielsweise zu einer Suppe verarbeiten, welche die Empfindungen und das Bewusstsein ihrer ursprünglichen Form beibehält und sich daher vollkommen gewahr ist, was geschieht, bis sie sich am Ende des Verdauungsprozesses vollständig auflöst. Ich sehe an Eurer Miene, dass Ihr bereits entschieden habt."
languages.original_text: "The second option, which is less rational but just as acceptable, is to be obstinate. I will find a use for you in any case. For instance, you could be processed into a sentient soup that retains the sensations and awareness of its original form and is therefore aware of everything that happens until it dissolves completely at the end of the digestive process. I see from your expression that you have already chosen."

traits.locale_text: "Die zweite Option — weniger rational, aber ebenso akzeptabel — ist, Euch stur zu stellen. Ich finde auf jeden Fall eine Verwendung für Euch. Ich könnte Euch beispielsweise zu einer Suppe verarbeiten, welche die Empfindungen und das Bewusstsein ihrer ursprünglichen Form beibehält und sich daher vollkommen gewahr ist, was geschieht, bis sie sich am Ende des Verdauungsprozesses vollständig auflöst. Ich sehe an Eurer Miene, dass Ihr bereits entschieden habt."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: «La segunda opción, que es menos racional pero igual de aceptable, es resistirse. En cualquier caso, te buscaré una utilidad. Por ejemplo, podría procesarte para crear una sopa consciente que retenga las sensaciones y conciencia de su forma original, y pueda experimentar todo lo que le ocurre hasta que se disuelva por completo al final del proceso digestivo. Por tu cara veo que ya has tomado una decisión».
languages.original_text: "The second option, which is less rational but just as acceptable, is to be obstinate. I will find a use for you in any case. For instance, you could be processed into a sentient soup that retains the sensations and awareness of its original form and is therefore aware of everything that happens until it dissolves completely at the end of the digestive process. I see from your expression that you have already chosen."

traits.locale_text: «La segunda opción, que es menos racional pero igual de aceptable, es resistirse. En cualquier caso, te buscaré una utilidad. Por ejemplo, podría procesarte para crear una sopa consciente que retenga las sensaciones y conciencia de su forma original, y pueda experimentar todo lo que le ocurre hasta que se disuelva por completo al final del proceso digestivo. Por tu cara veo que ya has tomado una decisión».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: 「ふたつ目の選択肢は、合理的とは言えないが、同じように許容できる。いずれにせよ、私はお前の使い道を見つけるつもりだ。例えば、お前を感覚を持ったスープに加工させたりな。そのスープは、元の形の感覚と意識を保持する。したがって、消化プロセスの最後に完全に溶けるまで、起こることすべてを認識するのだ。その表情から察するに、お前は既にこの道に決めたようだな」
languages.original_text: "The second option, which is less rational but just as acceptable, is to be obstinate. I will find a use for you in any case. For instance, you could be processed into a sentient soup that retains the sensations and awareness of its original form and is therefore aware of everything that happens until it dissolves completely at the end of the digestive process. I see from your expression that you have already chosen."

traits.locale_text: 「ふたつ目の選択肢は、合理的とは言えないが、同じように許容できる。いずれにせよ、私はお前の使い道を見つけるつもりだ。例えば、お前を感覚を持ったスープに加工させたりな。そのスープは、元の形の感覚と意識を保持する。したがって、消化プロセスの最後に完全に溶けるまで、起こることすべてを認識するのだ。その表情から察するに、お前は既にこの道に決めたようだな」
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "İkinci seçenek ki bu o kadar rasyonel olmamakla birlikte kabul edilebilirdir, dik başlı olmak. Sana işime yarayabileceğin bir yer bulurum ben. Örneğin seni işleyebilir, orijinal biçiminin sahip olduğu duyuları ve farkındalığı kaybetmemiş, bilinç sahibi bir çorbaya dönüştürebilirim ve böylece sindirim sürecinin en sonunda çözülene dek olan biten her şeyi birebir yaşarsın. Yüz ifadenden hangi seçeneği seçtiğini anlayabiliyorum."
languages.original_text: "The second option, which is less rational but just as acceptable, is to be obstinate. I will find a use for you in any case. For instance, you could be processed into a sentient soup that retains the sensations and awareness of its original form and is therefore aware of everything that happens until it dissolves completely at the end of the digestive process. I see from your expression that you have already chosen."

traits.locale_text: "İkinci seçenek, ki daha az rasyonel olsa da yine de kabul edilebilirdir, dik başlı olmak. Sana işime yarayabileceğin bir yer bulurum bir şekilde. Örneğin seni işleyerek, orijinal biçiminin sahip olduğu duyuları ve farkındalığı kaybetmemiş, bilinç sahibi bir çorbaya dönüştürebilirim ve böylece sindirim sürecinin en sonunda çözülene dek olan biten her şeyi birebir yaşarsın. Yüz ifadenden hangi seçeneği seçtiğini anlayabiliyorum."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
